snippet.title: Like A Dragon: Yakuza Pirate In Hawaii Gameplay Overview | RGG Summit 2024
snippet.description:
We learn more about Like A Dragon: Yakuza Pirate In Hawaii in this game overview showcased during RGG Summit 2024. 

The game releases February 28th, 2025.

See Timestamps for Gameplay Overview Sections
0:00 Intro
0:15 Combat Gameplay
1:50 Mad Dog and Sea Dog Combat Style Explainer
6:15 The Setting
6:34 Location Gameplay and Explainer
8:41 Mini Games Gameplay and Explainer

#likeadragon #majima #gaming
